title: Saya South X: Retail leasing in progress — early anchors signed
content: Saya South X has signed preliminary agreements with regional F&B and retail brands. Leasing for ground-floor flagship units is underway; expected occupancy for first phase is Q3 2026. Interested tenants can request pace maps and rates from the leasing team.

title: Footfall expected to rise due to new residential launches nearby
content: With multiple residential projects near Sector Ecotech-12 completing in the next 12 months, retail demand and customer footfall for mixed-use hubs like Saya South X are forecast to increase significantly.

title: Greater Noida West gains traction as next NCR growth corridor
content: Infrastructure improvements and new transport links are drawing investor attention to Greater Noida West — developers report rising interest in commercial spaces near major link roads.
